item.title: [üìù] Ligolo-ng, pivot/tunnel tool.
item.description: Ligolo-ng stands out as a straightforward, lightweight, and high-speed tool specifically designed for penetration testers to create tunnels through a reverse TCP/TLS connection using a tun interface, eliminating the need for SOCKS proxies. / / (_)___ _____ / /___ ____ ____ _ / / / / __ `/ __ \/ / __ \______/ __ \/ __ `/ / /___/ / /_/ / /_/ / / /_/ /_____/ / / / /_/ / /_____/_/\__, /\____/_/\____/ /_/ /_/\__, / /____/ /____/ Cheat Sheet Here’s a cheat sheet with the most commonly used commands:
